page.title: 06Tourism in Inversnaid
page.content: This block is in the Stirling,Loch Lomond and Trossachs Tourist Board area,and is extremely popular. The "Countess Fiona" cruises daily on Loch Lomond between Balloch and Inversnaid. The{West Highland Way } which is popular with walkers goes right up the E.coast of Loch Lomond. Walkers and coach parties make Inversnaid a stopping place. North of Inversnaid is{Rob Roy's cave. } There is salmon and trout fishing in Loch Lomond andLoch Arklet. Cruisers are available for hire on Loch Lomond. Although the road from Kinlochard is single track it carries many cars and coaches full of people who come to admire the scenery, and visit places of historical interest like the {Garrison church}and Rob Roy's cave.
